claim: Tropic Thunder was created by Stiller.
premise_source_doc_sentence: From 2007 to 2008 he worked with Ben Stiller at DreamWorks Pictures on the Academy Award-nominated film Tropic Thunder in the editing department , and received a letter of recommendation from Ben Stiller .

claim: Tropic Thunder was created by Stiller.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Tropic Thunder is a 2008 satirical action comedy film co-written , produced , and directed by Ben Stiller .
